name: Project
description: A Project groups datasets into a lager collection of datasets that have been collected or used in the same Campaign.

name: Composite
description: A composite dataset groups a number of datasets that are inseparable.

name: Split dataset
description: A split dataset groups a number of identical datasets that have to be split e.g. in case of different time scale resolution.

name: Label
description: A Label groups different datasets into a larger collection of datasets, that are now a composite, but i.e. collected at the same site.
